languages.text: "Приветствую, Лорд-капитан. Я... хотела сказать, что путешествие сквозь варп прошло успешно. Хоть и с трудом, но мой навигаторский взор сумел узреть свет Астрономикона, скрывающийся за беспокойными волнами Моря Душ. Команда и кормчий вели себя достойно. Мои наставления во время перелета помогли им собраться и провести корабль без серьезных происшествий".

traits.locale_text: "Приветствую, Лорд-капитан. Я... хотела сказать, что путешествие сквозь варп прошло успешно. Хоть и с трудом, но мой навигаторский взор сумел узреть свет Астрономикона, скрывающийся за беспокойными волнами Моря Душ. Команда и кормчий вели себя достойно. Мои наставления во время перелета помогли им собраться и провести корабль без серьезных происшествий".

languages.text: "Greetings, Lord Captain. I... I meant to inform you that our journey through the warp went well. My Navigator's gaze perceived the light of the Astronomican beyond the tumultuous waves of the Sea of Souls, albeit with some difficulty. The crew and the Master Helmsman conducted themselves adequately. My instructions during the jump helped them find their focus and guide the ship without any serious incidents."
languages.original_text: "Приветствую, Лорд-капитан. Я... хотела сказать, что путешествие сквозь варп прошло успешно. Хоть и с трудом, но мой навигаторский взор сумел узреть свет Астрономикона, скрывающийся за беспокойными волнами Моря Душ. Команда и кормчий вели себя достойно. Мои наставления во время перелета помогли им собраться и провести корабль без серьезных происшествий".

Albeit with some difficulty, my Navigator's gaze perceived the light of the Astronomican beyond the tumultuous waves of the Sea of Souls. The crew and the Master Helmsman conducted themselves adequately. My instructions during the jump helped them find their focus and guide the ship without any severe mishappenings."

The crew and the Master Helmsman conducted themselves adequately. My instructions during the jump helped them find their focus and guide the ship without any serious incidents."

languages.text: “你好，舰长大人。我……我想来告诉你，我们的亚空间之旅目前一切顺利。在波涛汹涌的灵魂之海中，我的导航者之眼仍然能够依稀辨认出星炬之光。全体船员和舵手长都表现出色，只需要在跃迁的过程中稍加指点，他们就能找准方向，驾驶飞船平稳前进，没出过什么岔子。”
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Lord Captain. I... I meant to inform you that our journey through the warp went well. My Navigator's gaze perceived the light of the Astronomican beyond the tumultuous waves of the Sea of Souls, albeit with some difficulty. The crew and the Master Helmsman conducted themselves adequately. My instructions during the jump helped them find their focus and guide the ship without any serious incidents."

traits.locale_text: “你好，舰长大人。我……我想来告诉你，我们的亚空间之旅目前一切顺利。在波涛汹涌的灵魂之海中，我的导航者之眼仍然能够依稀辨认出星炬之光。全体船员和舵手长都表现出色，只需要在跃迁的过程中稍加指点，他们就能找准方向，驾驶飞船平稳前进，没出过什么岔子。”

languages.text: "Seid gegrüßt, Lord Captain. Ich ... ich wollte Euch berichten, dass unsere Reise durch den Warp gut verlaufen ist. Mein Navigatorenblick hat das Licht des Astronomican jenseits der wilden Wellen des Meers der Seelen wahrgenommen, wenn auch mit einiger Schwierigkeit. Die Crew und der Hauptsteuermann haben adäquate Leistungen gezeigt. Durch meine Anweisungen während des Sprungs haben sie ihren Fokus gefunden und konnten das Schiff ohne größere Zwischenfalle steuern."
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Lord Captain. I... I meant to inform you that our journey through the warp went well. My Navigator's gaze perceived the light of the Astronomican beyond the tumultuous waves of the Sea of Souls, albeit with some difficulty. The crew and the Master Helmsman conducted themselves adequately. My instructions during the jump helped them find their focus and guide the ship without any serious incidents."

traits.locale_text: "Seid gegrüßt, Lord Captain. Ich ... ich wollte Euch berichten, dass unsere Reise durch den Warp gut verlaufen ist. Mein Navigatorenblick hat das Licht des Astronomican jenseits der wilden Wellen des Meers der Seelen wahrgenommen, wenn auch mit einiger Schwierigkeit. Die Crew und der Hauptsteuermann haben adäquate Leistungen gezeigt. Durch meine Anweisungen während des Sprungs haben sie ihren Fokus gefunden und konnten das Schiff ohne größere Zwischenfalle steuern."

languages.text: « Bonjour, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je... je voulais vous informer que notre voyage à travers le Warp s'est bien déroulé. Avec mon regard de navigatrice, j'ai perçu la lumière de l'Astronomican au-delà des vagues tumultueuses de la Mer des Âmes, quoiqu'avec quelque difficulté. L'équipage et le maître timonier se sont montrés à la hauteur. Mes instructions durant le saut les ont aidés à se concentrer et à guider le vaisseau sans incident majeur. »
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Lord Captain. I... I meant to inform you that our journey through the warp went well. My Navigator's gaze perceived the light of the Astronomican beyond the tumultuous waves of the Sea of Souls, albeit with some difficulty. The crew and the Master Helmsman conducted themselves adequately. My instructions during the jump helped them find their focus and guide the ship without any serious incidents."

traits.locale_text: « Bonjour, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je... je voulais vous informer que notre voyage à travers le Warp s'est bien déroulé. Avec mon regard de navigatrice, j'ai perçu la lumière de l'Astronomican au-delà des vagues tumultueuses de la Mer des Âmes, quoiqu'avec quelque difficulté. L'équipage et le maître timonier se sont montrés à la hauteur. Mes instructions durant le saut les ont aidés à se concentrer et à guider le vaisseau sans incident majeur. »

languages.text: «Saludos, Lord Capitán. Quería informarle de que nuestro viaje por la disformidad ha ido bien. Mi mirada navegante percibió la luz del Astronomicón más allá del tumultuoso Mar de Almas, aunque con cierta dificultad. La tripulación y el maestro timonel se comportaron adecuadamente. Mis instrucciones durante el salto les ayudaron a centrarse y guiar la nave sin incidentes graves».
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Lord Captain. I... I meant to inform you that our journey through the warp went well. My Navigator's gaze perceived the light of the Astronomican beyond the tumultuous waves of the Sea of Souls, albeit with some difficulty. The crew and the Master Helmsman conducted themselves adequately. My instructions during the jump helped them find their focus and guide the ship without any serious incidents."

traits.locale_text: «Saludos, Lord Capitán. Quería informarle de que nuestro viaje por la disformidad ha ido bien. Mi mirada navegante percibió la luz del Astronomicón más allá del tumultuoso mar de almas, aunque con cierta dificultad. La tripulación y el maestro timonel se comportaron adecuadamente. Mis instrucciones durante el salto les ayudaron a centrarse y guiar la nave sin incidentes graves».

languages.text: 「ご機嫌よう、ロード・キャプテン。あ…あたくしは、この旅で歪みを上手く抜けられたことをお知らせしようと思ったんです。少し困難はありましたが、魂の海の激しい波の向こうにある星辰波の光を航宙士の眼で感知しました。乗組員とマスター・ヘルムスマンは、適切に行動してくれました。ジャンプの間にあたくしが出した指示で、彼らの集中力を保たせ、大きな問題を起こすことなく船を導くことができました」
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Lord Captain. I... I meant to inform you that our journey through the warp went well. My Navigator's gaze perceived the light of the Astronomican beyond the tumultuous waves of the Sea of Souls, albeit with some difficulty. The crew and the Master Helmsman conducted themselves adequately. My instructions during the jump helped them find their focus and guide the ship without any serious incidents."

traits.locale_text: 「ご機嫌よう、ロード・キャプテン。あ…あたくしは、この旅で歪みを上手く抜けられたことをお知らせしようと思ったんです。少し困難はありましたが、魂の海の激しい波の向こうにある星辰波の光を航宙士の眼で感知しました。乗組員とマスター・ヘルムスマンは、適切に行動してくれました。ジャンプの間にあたくしが出した指示で、彼らの集中力を保たせ、大きな問題を起こすことなく船を導くことができました」

languages.text: "Merhabalar Lord Kaptan. Ben... Öteboyut seyahatimizin sorunsuz geçtiğini haber vermek istemiştim. Rotacı gözüm, çalkantılı Ruhlar Denizi'nin ötesindeki Astronom ışığını biraz zor da olsa sezdi. Mürettebat ve Başserdümen de görevlerini layıkıyla yerine getirdi. Sıçrama esnasındaki talimatlarım sayesinde odaklanmasını ve gemiyi ciddi bir kaza yaşanmadan idare etmesini bildiler."
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Lord Captain. I... I meant to inform you that our journey through the warp went well. My Navigator's gaze perceived the light of the Astronomican beyond the tumultuous waves of the Sea of Souls, albeit with some difficulty. The crew and the Master Helmsman conducted themselves adequately. My instructions during the jump helped them find their focus and guide the ship without any serious incidents."
